title: Tainted Blood
description: Six months after Brian saves Heather's life, Brian finds himself living just outside Reno without the love of his life. Yet trouble is still brewing for this estranged couple. Powerful forces, both political and supernatural seek to entangle the two, and bring them back into a web of intrigue and deception.As enemies close in on the new lives they've made for themselves, will the power of one young vampire's blood be strong enough to not only save the two of them, but to heal what has been broken?This is book two of the Fallen Series. Book one is Fallen Blood.
author: Martin C. Sharlow
